Citation: To William Tuttle for his outstanding make-up achievement for 7 Faces of Dr. Lao.
To PETRO VLAHOS, WADSWORTH E. POHL and UB IWERKS for the conception and perfection of techniques for Color Traveling Matte Composite Cinematography.

Nominees: Sidney P. Solow|EDWARD H. REICHARD|CARL W. HAUGE|JOB SANDERSON
Citation: To SIDNEY P. SOLOW, EDWARD H. REICHARD, CARL W. HAUGE and JOB SANDERSON of Consolidated Film Industries for the design and development of a versatile Automatic 35mm Composite Color Printer.
To PIERRE ANGENIEUX for the development of a ten-to-one Zoom Lens for cinematography.

Nominees: Milton Forman|RICHARD B. GLICKMAN|DANIEL J. PEARLMAN
Citation: To MILTON FORMAN, RICHARD B. GLICKMAN and DANIEL J. PEARLMAN of ColorTran Industries for advancements in the design and application to motion picture photography of lighting units using quartz iodine lamps.
To STEWART FILMSCREEN CORPORATION for a seamless translucent Blue Screen for Traveling Matte Color Cinematography.
To ANTHONY PAGLIA and the 20TH CENTURY-FOX STUDIO MECHANICAL EFFECTS DEPARTMENT for an improved method of producing Explosion Flash Effects for motion pictures.
To EDWARD H. REICHARD and CARL W. HAUGE of Consolidated Film Industries for the design of a Proximity Cue Detector and its application to motion picture printers.

Nominees: Edward H. Reichard|LEONARD L. SOKOLOW|CARL W. HAUGE
Citation: To EDWARD H. REICHARD, LEONARD L. SOKOLOW and CARL W. HAUGE of Consolidated Film Industries for the design and application to motion picture laboratory practice of a Stroboscopic Scene Tester for color and black-and-white film.
To NELSON TYLER for the design and construction of an improved Helicopter Camera System.
